60 21 21 19 5 12 25 1900 5xl 65 21 21 21 12 25 2100 6xl 70 5 21 21 22 25 12 25 2300 construction this cardigan is knit seamlessly from the top direction of knitting down the collar garter stitch is worked first next you pick up stitches along the edge of the collar then place the stitches from the provisional cast-on collar onto the lh needle and work across them you then work the yoke with raglan increases to the underarm last you work body and sleeves to the cuffs for help with this project check out our in-depth harvest cardigan tutorial collar using larger needles cast on 10 10 12 12 14 14 14 14 14 16 16 16 16 18 18 18 18 18 18 sts provisionally using the crochet chain provisional cast-on method back set-up row ws p2 knit to end row 1 rs knit collar row 2 ws p2 knit to end work row 1-2 a total of 39 46 48 48 48 50 50 50 50 57 62 61 61 57 62 66 68 70 70 times right left this creates the same number of garter ridges front front this is a total of 79 93 97 97 97 101 101 101 101 115 125 123 123 115 125 133 137 141 141 row worked including the set-up row you will end with a ws row 2 harvest cardigan facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 4 eveels thgir eveels tfel yoke increase at raglan markers every 2nd row then every row for some sizes increase at neckline every 4th row sleeve sts on hold body of knitting direction harvest cardigan construction provisional cast-on pick up sts along this edge knit rs of collar sts knit across provisional cast-on stitches separation of sleeves and body sleeve sts on hold sts cast on at underarms body sts on needle increase at neckline every 2nd or 4th row yoke row 1 rs knit to marker sm knit to 1 st before raglan marker m1 k1 sm k1 m1 4 times on the following row you will pick up and knit to marker sm knit to end 8 sts increase - 2 at knit along the edge of the collar to prepare for each raglan marker working the raglan yoke of the cardigan row 2 ws knit to marker sm purl to last pick-up row rs knit to the last 2 sts pm k1 marker sm knit to end m1 k1 this is the end of the row row 3 rs knit to marker sm k2 m1 knit to next turn work
